cause.description:
To liberate Tamil Eelam from the state of Sri lanka. Tamil Eelam is the motherland of Tamils from Ceylon and is currently occupied by the Sinhalese military.
1. Sri lankan Armed forces must leave Tamil Eelam.
2. Tamils should live in their own land freely and independently.
3. Tamil Eelam should gain independence.
cause.mission: To gain independence from Sri lanka and to liberate the Tamil people from the Sinhalese oppression...
cause.name: Liberate Tamil Eelam
